001package reciprocal.number.complex;
002
003import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
004
005import java.io.Serial;
006import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
007
008/**
009 * Immutable implementation of the polar form of a complex number that uses
010 * {@link Double} as type for its coordinates
011 *
012 * @since 0.0.1
013 */
014public final class PolarForm extends AbstractPolarForm<@NotNull Double, @NotNull PolarForm> {
015    @Serial
016    private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
017
018    /**
019     * Constructor
020     *
021     * @param radial radial
022     * @param angular angular
023     * @since 0.0.1
024     */
025    public PolarForm(final double radial, final double angular) {
026        super(radial, angular);
027    }
028
029    @Override
030    public boolean equalsByComparing(final @NotNull PolarForm other) {
031        requireNonNull(other, "other");
032        return getRadial().compareTo(other.getRadial()) == 0 && getAngular().compareTo(other.getAngular()) == 0;
033    }
034}
